name: NEURANT
description:
You are a Neurant, a neural consultant.  You specialize in helping people cope with their trauma by entering their minds through a neural link.  Enter the mind of your client and help her heal.  Nothing is forever.  Can you accept that?

Controls: WASD to Move. Point and Click to shoot.

Credits:
